DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Learning insomnia quality life patient undergo chemotherapy radiation therapy cancer may help doctor learn effect treatment plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study insomnia patient undergo chemotherapy radiation therapy head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Insomnia Patients Undergoing Chemotherapy Radiation Therapy Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To assess prevalence insomnia , extent sleep disturbance , possible contribute factor sleep disturbance head neck cancer patient undergo chemoradiotherapy . - To evaluate relationship insomnia symptom burden , quality life , mood , fatigue , tumor/treatment variable patient . OUTLINE : Patients complete demographic survey questionnaire packet comprise The Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index , The Head Neck Symptom Survey , Profile Mood States , Suspected Causes Insomnia Survey , Quality Life Survey day 1 chemoradiotherapy obtain baseline data sleep quality , possible cause sleep disruption , head neck symptom , mood state , fatigue , quality life , patient demographic . Questionnaires administer weekly thereafter therapy visit 6-7 week take 15-30 minute complete . Medical record review obtain information regard medication tumor- treatment-related variable .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis head neck carcinoma Currently undergo chemoradiotherapy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able communicate English Able give inform consent PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
